item.description:
Climbing the walls with friends....what could be more fun?

We will be climbing from 2-4 so lets meet a little early to get ourselves organized. Please fill out the safety agreement and Registration Form and bring it with you, to help speed up the process.

http://www.carabiners...

About the Venue : Carabiner's Indoor Climbing opened in December 2004 as a brand-new climbing facility designed from the ground up to offer a unique indoor climbing experience.

We have a limit of 24 climbers and we will need all RSVP's in by March 1st so I can call and firm up the reservation.

The cost will be between $22 and $30 depending on the number of people who show up. So please if you RSVP yes be sure and show up so others don't have to cover the cost.

We will be going to a local Portuguese restaurant after. If you would be interested in joining us, please take the time to register for the PORTUGUESE GRILL meet-up.
Hope to see you there!

http://www.carabiners...
http://www.carabiners...
item.how_to_find_us: We will meet right inside the front door.
item.name: Climbing the Wall
